channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Three billionaires dropped by a fried-chicken joint—and Jensen Huang bought everyone dinner
item.description: Nvidia’s Jensen Huang sparked a Korean-fried-chicken stock surge after a viral dinner in Seoul.

item.title: Disney-YouTube TV blackout angers cord cutters who ditched cable only to find the same hassles on streaming
item.description: It’s certainly been a spooky week for the Walt Disney Company and Google. The two corporations are in the midst of a carriage dispute that has resulte...

item.title: Amazon lifts markets to close out another winning week and month
item.description: Amazon is leading the U.S. stock market on Friday to the finish of another winning week and month. The S&P 500 was virtually flat after giving up a mo...

item.title: What Your Company Can Expect As Employer Health Insurance Costs Climb in 2026
item.description: Employer-provided family health insurance plan prices rose 6 percent this year, and will likely increase by double-digits next year.

item.title: What Recent Domain Trends Signal About Global Brand Strategy
item.description: Strengthen your company’s digital visibility with the right domain name.

item.title: How a Work Permit Renewal Change Threatens Companies and Employees With Legal Troubles
item.description: An end to the automatic extension of legal immigrant work permits could upend many companies. Start the renewal process as early as possible.

item.title: Crypto’s second wave of ETFs arrives, investors snap up new Solana offering
item.description: New Litecoin and Hedera ETFs also launched, but to more modest demand.

item.title: Is Your Company Optimized for Generative AI? This GEO Startup Says It Should Be
item.description: The Prompting Company just raised $6.5 million to help businesses improve their visibility in generative AI search results.

item.title: Nearly 600,000 bottles of blood pressure pills recalled over cancer risk
item.description: Check your medicine cabinet: A major pharmaceutical company has just recalled nearly 600,000 bottles of a blood pressure medication due to the potenti...

item.title: Exxon and Chevron hike oil production despite global glut and see more ‘frontier exploration’ as U.S. shale boom slows
item.description: Chevron cited more exploration efforts in Suriname, Brazil, Angola, Nigeria, Namibia, and the Middle East.

item.title: Hybristophilia: Study links TikTok to women’s sexual attraction to criminals
item.description: Ted Bundy had courtroom groupies. Jeffrey Dahmer and Richard Ramirez were sent love letters in prison. Now, in the age of social media, thousands like...

item.title: Disney pulls ABC, ESPN and more channels from YouTube TV over contract dispute
item.description: YouTube TV viewers can no longer see Disney channels including ABC and ESPN after the two sides failed to agree on a new content distribution deal. Ot...

item.title: Powell suggested tech giants fueling the AI boom and GDP hardly care about Fed rate tweaks. They just proved him right
item.description: Powell said companies are “making money in building [data centers]—it’s not about 25 basis points here or there.”

item.title: Trump may have skipped APEC—but Xi’s using it to sell China as globalization’s last defender
item.description: It’s Xi’s first visit to South Korea in 11 years.
